body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello, thank you for contacting Alpha Motors. My name is Christian Martin. May I have your name, please?

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Nice to meet you, Debra. Can you please provide me with your email address and phone number for our records?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Sure, my email is debraflores@email.com and my phone number is five five five, three eight zero, two one zero zero.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for providing that information, Debra. Could you also share your mailing address with us?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Of course, my mailing address is one two three Main Street, Cityville, State, ZIP code one zero zero zero one.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you, Debra. Your details have been noted. Is there anything else I can assist you with today?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: No, thank you. I feel relieved now that everything is sorted out.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: I'm glad to hear that. Thank you for your time, Debra. If you have any further questions, feel free to reach out. Have a great day!
